llm_res.rule: MUST trigger when tokens are transferred, including zero value transfers. A token contract which creates new tokens SHOULD trigger a Transfer event with the _from address set to 0x0 when tokens are created.
The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.

MUST trigger when tokens are transferred, including zero value transfers. A token contract which creates new tokens SHOULD trigger a Transfer event with the _from address set to 0x0 when tokens are created.
llm_res.function: execute(address uniswapPool, address[] memory recipients, uint256  tokenAmounts, uint256  wethAmounts)

llm_res.rule: MUST trigger when tokens are transferred, including zero value transfers. A token contract which creates new tokens SHOULD trigger a Transfer event with the _from address set to 0x0 when tokens are created.
